package.name: easyshipper
package.summary: Sendr is a Belgian shipping solution optimized for E-commerce by ShopWeDo.com
package.description:
We offer a simple and cost effective service to ship your parcels worldwide.
  • Send your parcels at 30-50% cheaper rates
  • View our prices on our website
  • Choose home delivery or (from within ShopWeDo: thousands of pickup points) all over the Benelux and Europe
  • No minimum, no contract required
  • Track and Trace emails
Pay as you use: We only charge the shipping costs of parcels you've sent. So, no hidden costs or contracts.
package.notes: First time release. Enabling our existing, and future Magento customers to send an orders shipping address to the Sendr backend. A button has been added inside every order called [ Get a label with sendr ]
